moves.name: Flamethrower
moves.effect: Has a very small chance of leaving the target burned.

moves.name: X Sp. Atk All
moves.effect: Sharply raises the Sp. Atk of all allied sync pairs.

moves.name: Let’s Brainstorm!
moves.effect: Raises the Sp. Atk and Speed of all allied sync pairs.

moves.name: Overheat
moves.effect: Sharply lowers the user’s Sp. Atk.

passives.name: Wide Awake
passives.description: Prevents the Pokémon from falling asleep.

passives.name: First Aid 2
passives.description: Restores a bit of the Pokémon’s HP once during battle when the Pokémon is in a pinch.

passives.name: Wise Entry 1
passives.description: Raises the user’s Sp. Def when the Pokémon enters a battle.
